story.author: Everyone can be an author
story.title: Test the experience!
story.description: This is a long description about how this adventure is crazy funny! PS: It's also a test story, so you can see what this app supports in story telling!

1001.title: The first tag
1001.description: This is the first tag, welcome. On every tag there will be a description, questions, or a story. Underneath you can find a button, either for going directly to the hint on where the next tag is, or answers to the question asked. Let us keep it simple the first time, and just click the button, no question asked.
1001.question: There is only one choice here, and it's a riddle to get to the next tag. Enjoy!

Show me how to get to the next tag.title: First hint
Show me how to get to the next tag.text:
Do you know where I can get a coffee at a reasonable price? That's where the next tag is.
Here we have a simple text that hint off where the next tag is found. As you can see fromt he button bellow, you need to scan something. In this case it is a QR-code. Press the help button to read about QR-codes or to skip if you can't find the code.

1002.title: Fruits
1002.description: People like fruit because it's healty and sweet.
1002.question: What is your favourite fruit?

Banana.text: Since you are such a fan of bananas, you should go the banana tree

Apple.text: As an apple fan, you should know where this image is taken from. Hurry up, the others are closing in.

Orange.text:
People who like orange often find them self wandering around pounding the all important question "who are you?"

Sound by 11linda (freesound.org)

1003.title: Rocks everywhere
1003.description: You are in a beautiful forest...but you can't find your pet rock.
1003.question: Where is that damn rock!

Take a look.text: Ah, there it is. You should hurry over to where this image is taken.

1004.title: Rockmaster
1004.description: It's a mighty fine rock you have there, wonder what kind of music you can play with it.
1004.question: Could you please play a song with it?

Bing bing doom.text: No, I don't like that one. Please just go...to that tall building over there.

Follow me.text: Just follow the arrow and you will find the treasure (with optional length to the treasure)

1006.title: The Tower in the Forest
1006.description: Welcome to the tower in the forest. You are not far from home now.

Follow the map.text: Use the map to navigate home

1007.title: The end
1007.description: Welcome home, you are now done! Thank you for experiencing my story! Hope you enjoyed it.
